This means any damage taken or consumables used in the current room will be reset back to the previous state.
Turns into the regular Hour Glass item after being used 5 times

items.title: Circle of Protection
effects: Gives Isaac a large white halo around him, that deals a bit of damage to any enemies in contact with the ring.
Every time an enemy bullet enters the ring, there is a chance it will reflect a homing tear back at the enemy.
items.itemPool: Angel Room, Greed Mode Angel Room

items.title: Sack Head
effects: All bomb, coin, key, and battery pickups pickups now have a chance to be replaced with a sack that contains multiple pickups.
Can lead to game-breaking combinations with the D20 due to the amount of consumables and batteries spawned by the item sacks.

items.title: Night Light
effects: Gives Isaac a cone of light infront of him that slows any enemies inside it and their tears.
The light faces the direction that you are facing, not the direction you are firing.
Removes Curse of Darkness for the current floor, if picked up on a floor where the curse is active.

items.title: Obsessed Fan
effects: A purple familiar fly that follows your exact movement on a 3 second delay and deals contact damage to enemies.
items.itemPool: Item Room, Greed Mode Item Room

items.title: Mine Crafter
effects: When used, places an explosive TNT barrel next to you.
The TNT barrel can be pushed and used to explode rocks or damage enemies.
If used a second time in the same room while the last TNT barrel is still there, it will remotely explode the first TNT and not spawn another.

items.title: PJs
effects: +4 Soul Hearts
Fully restores your red health.

items.title: Head of the Keeper
effects: Isaac's tears become coins and now have a chance to drop pennies on the floor upon successfully hitting an enemy.
Has a chance to drop when exploding a dead shopkeeper and also appear in the Gold Chest pool.
items.itemPool: Gold Chest, Greed Mode Gold Chest, Dead shopkeeper

items.title: Papa Fly
effects: A familiar blue fly that will follow Isaac's movement pattern but delayed by 3 seconds.
Papa Fly will fire tears at nearby enemies that deal damage equal to Isaac's tear damage.
items.itemPool: Item Room, Greed Mode Item Room

items.title: Multidimensional Baby
effects: A familiar baby that will follow your movement pattern on a 3 second delay. Tears that pass through the baby will double up and increase in damage while flashing black & white.
items.itemPool: Item Room, Greed Mode Item Room, Devil Room, Greed Mode Devil Room

items.title: Glitter Bombs
effects: Isaac's normal bombs become pink and causes them to drop random pickups when they explode (e.g. keys, coins, bombs).
items.itemPool: Item Room, Greed Mode Item Room

items.title: My Shadow
effects: Each time you take damage, My Shadow will apply a fear effect to all enemies in the room and spawn a familiar black charger that will attack for you.
The charger will be killed if it is damaged too much.
items.itemPool: Devil Room, Greed Mode Devil Room
items.unlock: Unlock this item by beating Greed Mode with Judas.

items.title: Jar of Flies
effects: Every time you kill an enemy a fly will be added to the Jar, allowing you to stack up to 20.
Using the Jar of Flies will release all the flies that are currently in the jar as friendly flies that will damage enemies.
items.itemPool: Shop, Greed Mode Item Room, Greed Mode Shop

items.title: Lil Loki
effects: A Loki familiar that follows Isaac and shoots tears 4 tears in a cross pattern.

items.title: Milk!
effects: Gives Isaac a familiar glass of milk that follows him and spills on the floor upon taking damage.
After being spilt, the milk gives you a Tears Up for the rest of the room.
items.itemPool: Item Room, Greed Mode Item Room

items.title: D7
effects: When used, the D7 will restart the current room and bring back all enemies once again, enabling you to farm rewards that spawn at the end after beating the room.
Can be used to generate infinite consumable combinations, gaining as many coins/keys/bombs as you need.
Will teleport you to out of the room if used in a Boss Room or Devil Room.
If used in a greed fight it can be used to reroll the room into a Shop.

items.title: Binky
effects: +1 Soul heart
+0.7 Tears Up.
Makes Isaac very small like a baby, reducing his hitbox size.

items.title: Mom's Box
effects: When used, Mom's Box will drop a random trinket on the ground.
+1 Luck while held.
While held, doubles the effect of trinkets which make sense to be doubled (e.g. +4 damage from Curved Horn instead of 2, -4 Tear Delay from Cancer instead of 2)

items.title: Kidney Stone
effects: Randomly while firing tears, Isaac will stop firing and turn red, where he will charge and release a lot of 'tears' in one go. In the burst of tears is a kidney stone which deals a lot of damage.
-0.2 Speed Down.
-15 Range Down.
+2.0 Tear height
The large decrease in range and tear height increase cause this item to overall be a slight range down.
items.itemPool: Item Room, Greed Mode Item Room
items.unlock: Unlock this item by beating Challenge #29 (Onan's Streak).

items.title: Mega Blast
effects: Upon use, fires a huge Mega Satan laser for 15 seconds, dealing massive damage to anything in its path and pushing Isaac back by the force.
The laser persists for the entire 15 seconds even between rooms and floors.
This item appears in the Devil Room but is weighted to be about 5 times rarer than all other devil room items.
items.itemPool: Devil Room, Greed Mode Devil Room
items.unlock: Unlock this item by beating Mega Satan with every character.

items.title: Dark Princes Crown
effects: A crown appears above your head and while at exactly 1 full red heart of health, you gain a +1.5 Range Up, +0.7 Tears Up and +0.20 Shot Speed Up
Any time your health changes to be not exactly 1 red heart you lose the effect
This item does nothing with The Lost
Similar to other Tears Up (not Tear Delay) items, if you are already at the soft tear rate cap this item does not give you a tears up.
items.unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Delirium as Azazel.

items.title: Apple!
effects: Gives you a random chance to fire a razor blade which deals 400% damage instead of your normal tears
+0.4 Tears Up.
This item also turns your tears red, but does not change your actual damage stat or the damage your normal tears do
The chance to fire a razor blade depends on your luck stat, and at +14 luck you will fire a razor blade every time

items.title: Lead Pencil
effects: With every 15 tears fired, Isaac will fire a cluster of tears instead of your normal tear
Causes your normal tears to fire out of one eye, which means tears will fire in a near-perfect line instead of slightly off-center.
Each of the tears in the cluster deals double damage

items.title: Dog Tooth
effects: +0.3 Damage Up
+0.1 Speed Up
When entering a room connected to a Secret Room or Super Secret Room, a howling sound will play
When entering a room with a crawl space trapdoor in it, a barking sound will play

items.title: Dead Tooth
effects: While firing, you gain a green aura that poisons any enemies which touch it
Has no effect on Lilith, as she cannot fire tears

items.title: Linger Bean
effects: While firing tears, you have a small chance to spawn a poop cloud, which deals periodic damage to any enemies which come near it
The cloud can be pushed slightly by firing tears at it

items.title: Shard of Glass
effects: Upon taking damage, this item gives a chance to drop a full red heart, gain 5 range, and leave a trail of damaging red creep for the current room.

items.title: Metal Plate
effects: +1 Soul Heart
Enemy bullets have a chance to be deflected back at the enemy, which will hurt them and apply the concussive status effect, causing it to be stunned for a few seconds

items.title: Eye of Greed
effects: Every 20th tear fired will also fire a golden coin tear at the same time. This tear turns enemies to gold for a few seconds and causes them to drop 1-4 coins if killed while golden (similar to the Midas' Touch item)
When the Midas Touch tear effect triggers, it will remove 1 coin from your current total
The golden tear deals double your tear damage
The effect can still trigger even if you have no held coins
items.unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Greedier Mode with Keeper.

items.title: Tarot Cloth
effects: Drops a random card or rune on pickup
Doubles the effect of certain tarot cards
For some cards this does not double the effect (e.g. Stars card only teleports you once)

items.title: Varicose Veins
effects: Every time you take damage, 10 high damage tears are fired in a circle around you (similar to the Tammy's Head effect)
Similar to Tammy's Head, this item synergizes with a lot of items (i.e. with Brimstone it fires 10 lasers)

items.title: Compound Fracture
effects: Turns your tears into bones, which shatter into 1-3 smaller bone shards upon hitting any object or enemy.
The smaller bone shards deal damage equal to half your normal tear damage
+1.5 Range Up
items.unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Delirium in The Void floor with Lazarus.

items.title: Polydactyly
effects: Allows Isaac to carry two cards, runes or pills (or any combination of these) at the same time.
Drops a random card, pill or rune on pickup

items.title: Dad's Lost Coin
effects: +1.5 Range Up
Drops a lucky penny
items.unlock: Unlock this item by beating Greedier Mode with The Lost.

items.title: Moldy Bread
effects: +1 Health Up

items.title: Cone Head
effects: +1 Soul Heart
Each time you take damage from any source, Cone Head has a chance to prevent it from reducing your health (similar to the Infamy item)
Isaac flashes blue very briefly when damage is negated by this item
tags: northernlion's head resembles an egg much like this item

items.title: Belly Button
effects: Drops one random trinket on pickup
Gives you an extra trinket slot (same effect as Mom's Purse)

items.title: Sinus Infection
effects: Isaac's tears have a random chance to be a booger instead, which stick on to enemies and deal periodic poison damage until they die
Each tick of poison damage is equal to your normal tear damage
Each booger persists until the enemy is dead or 60 seconds has passed

items.title: Glaucoma
effects: Adds a chance to shoot a concussive tear, which will cause enemies to walk around dazed in confusion.
The daze effect is effectively permanent for normal enemies, and has a much longer duration for bosses compared to other status effects
The visual effect of a Glaucoma tear is hard to notice, however it is slightly lighter than normal tears and is not a perfect circle shape

items.title: Parasitoid
effects: This item gives you a chance that instead of firing tears you will fire an egg sack, which slows enemies on hit and drops a pool of white slowing creep below them
If a parasitoid shot successfully hits an enemy, a blue friendly fly or spider is spawned

items.title: Eye of Belial
effects: Causes your tears to become piercing, allowing them to travel through enemies
After hitting its first enemy, each tear will double in damage and gain a homing effect
+1.5 Range Up
items.unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Greedier Mode with Judas.

items.title: Sulfuric Acid
effects: +0.3 Damage Up
Each tear has a chance to become acidic, allowing it to break rocks, pots and other breakable objects
Acidic tears can also be used to open secret rooms

items.title: Glyph of Balance
effects: +2 Soul Hearts
This item will modify drops from champion enemies based on your current player state. The priority list of what will drop from champion enemies in order is as follows:
Soul Hearts - When you have no red heart containers and less than 2 soul hearts
Red Hearts (Full hearts) - While at 0.5 red hearts
Keys - When you have no keys.
Bombs - When you have no Bombs
Red Hearts (Full hearts) - When you have at least half a red heart container empty
Coins - While at less than 15 cents
Keys - When you have less than 5 keys.
Bombs - When you have less than 5 bombs
Trinkets - If you have no trinkets and there are no trinkets on the ground in the room
Soul Hearts - When you have less than 6 total heart containers of any kind
If none of the above conditions are true, champions will resume dropping their regular pickups
items.unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Greedier mode with Maggy.

items.title: Analog Stick
effects: +0.4 Tears Up
Allows you to fire tears diagonally by holding down two of the fire buttons at once
If you are using a gamepad, this item allows you to fire in any direction

items.title: Contagion
effects: The first enemy you kill in each new room will now explode and poison all nearby enemies, causing them to take periodic damage until they also die and explode
If you have lots of enemies near each other this can cause a chain reaction, killing lots of enemies in one go

items.title: Finger!
effects: Gives Isaac a finger which floats infront of him and points in the same direction he is facing or firing. The finger deals 10% of your normal damage to all enemies in the same direction that the finger is pointing.
The finger will also deal damage to entities such as fires and poops
Applies on-hit status effects such as the burning debuff from Fire Mind
Spawns guppy flies if you have the Guppy transformation

items.title: Shade
effects: Isaac gains a shadow familiar that will follow Isaac's movement pattern delayed by 1 second and deal contact damage to enemies
items.unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Delirium in The Void floor with Judas.

items.title: Depression
effects: Isaac gains a cloud familiar that follows him and leaves a trail of tears on the floor which damages enemies for 2 damage per tick
Enemies touching the cloud have a chance to activate the Crack the Sky effect, which spawns a light beam that deals damage equal to your tear damage + 20

items.title: Hushy
effects: Gives Isaac a small Hush familiar that bounces around the room dealing 2 contact damage per tick
While firing tears Hushy will stop moving, which allows you to keep it in one place
Hushy will block enemy tears and projectiles
items.unlock: Unlock this item by beating Hush with Apollyon.

items.title: Lil Monstro
effects: Gives Isaac a small Monstro familar, who's tears can be charged and released in a shotgun style effect, much like Monstro's main attack
Lil Mosntro's tears each deal base damage (3.5) and does not scale with damage upgrades

items.title: King Baby
effects: A baby familiar that follows you and causes other familiars to follow it. It stops moving while Isaac is firing tears and upon releasing the fire button, King Baby will teleport back to your location.
King Baby will always appear first in the queue of familiars
items.unlock: Unlock this item by beating Delirium on The Void floor with ???.

items.title: Big Chubby
effects: A familiar that follows Isaac and charges forwards very slowly, dealing 2.7 damage per tick to any enemies it comes into contact with.
Almost identical to the Little Chubby familiar, but this one moves much more slowly and deals less damage

items.title: Tonsil
effects: Gives you a Tonsil familiar, which follows Isaac and blocks enemy projectiles
Does not deal contact damage to enemies

The Tonsil familiar counts as a passive item but does not appear in any item pools, meaning the only ways to find it and make it appear in your Items Collection page are a) hold the Tonsil trinket and trigger the effect, or b) start with it randomly as Eden

items.title: Plan C
effects: Upon use, this item deals 9,999,999 damage to all enemies in the room and then kills you 3 seconds later
This is a single use active item, meaning it is destroyed after using it
Does not kill both phases of multi-phase bosses like Hush or Ultra Greed
If used to kill a boss, the kill still counts as a victory for post-it note completion marks, but the run will still get a game over.

Delirium's death animation takes longer than 3 seconds, meaning you will die before it can count as a completion mark. One exception to this is if you are playing as Lazarus or have Lazarus' Rags - you will respawn in the same room and get the kill.
items.itemPool: Shop, Devil Room, Curse Room, Red Chest, Demon Beggar
items.unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Greedier Mode with Lazarus.

items.title: D1
effects: When used, the D1 duplicates 1 random pickup in the current room, including cards, runes, chests and trinkets
If you drop your current card, rune or pill and duplicate it, this item can effectively act similar to the Blank Card and Placebo items
Jera runes cannot be duplicated using the D1
Duplicated chests can turn into another kind of chest randomly (e.g. Red chests)
Can be used in a shop to duplicate pickups which have not yet been purchased, and take the duplicate pickup for free
items.unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Greedier Mode with Isaac.

items.title: Void
effects: When used, Void will consume any pedestal items in the current room
If an active item is consumed, its effect will be added to Void's effect when used, allowing you to consume multiple items and combine their effects
If a passive item is consumed, you gain a small stat upgrade to a random stat
Possible stat changes include: +1.0 flat damage, +0.5 tears, +0.2 speed, +0.2 shot speed, +0.5 range, +1.0 luck
Void does not work on devil deal or shop items unless they have been bought first
Using Void to absorb items in Boss Rush or Challenge Rooms counts as taking the items and will cause the encounter to start
Using Void on one time use items such as Mama Mega or Diplopia will cause their effect to instantly trigger and will not give you further uses through activating Void again.
items.unlock: Unlock this item by beating Delirium in The Void floor with Apollyon.

items.title: Pause
effects: Upon use, this item freezes all enemies in the room until you press the fire button again or 30 seconds passes (whichever happens first)
Unlike other active items, bosses are not immune to this effect
Touching a frozen enemy will still hurt you
This item doesn not affect troll bombs - they will still explode

items.title: Smelter
effects: Upon use, the Smelter will destroy your currently held trinket and give you the effect permanently, allowing you to stack up lots of different trinket effects
If a trinket has been smelted, it won't appear a second time unless the entire trinket pool is exhausted or you restart the run (e.g. by doing a victory lap)
items.unlock: Unlock this item by beating Mom's Heart on Hard Mode with Apollyon.

items.title: Compost
effects: When used, Compost doubles up the current number of blue flies and spiders you have.
Compost will also destroy every consumable on the ground in the current room and turn each of them into a blue fly or blue spider.
If you have no pickups on the ground in the current room and no other flies or spiders, Compost will spawn 1 blue fly or blue spider

items.title: Dataminer
effects: When used, this item will distort all the sprites and music, rotating graphics 90 degrees and translating them diagonally up/left, while leaving the hitbox in the same place. This can make it confusing while navigating the room.
Enemy hitboxes remain the same
Dataminer will randomly increase or decrease one of your stats by a small amount when used
Gives you the Fruit Cake effect for the room when used, which will give a random tear effect with every tear fired
All visual and tear effects reset after leaving the room

items.title: Clicker
effects: When used, this item will randomly change you into another character and remove one of your current passive items
All stat changes of the new character are applied (e.g. character damage multipliers)

This item can only reduce your heart containers and will not increase them if you change back into a character with more health. This means if you roll into The Lost, changing back to another character will leave you with only 1/2 of a soul heart
Cannot turn you into a character that isn't unlocked yet
Also includes Lazarus II (Lazarus' revived form) and Black Judas (effect of Judas' Shadow)
It's also possible that this item will pick the same character, making it seem like nothing happened

items.title: MaMa Mega!
effects: A one time use item that when used will explode all objects (i.e. rocks, poop) in the room and deal 200 damage to all enemies in the current room, as well as every other room for the remainder of the floor
Also opens the boss rush door after Mom's Foot, blue womb door after Mom's Heart, secret rooms and super secret rooms
Like all single-use items, this item cannot be absorbed and used multiple times by the Void item
Entering a room with an angel statue will destroy it and automatically spawn one of the Angel mini bosses

items.title: Wait What?
items.pickup: "I can't believe it's not butter bean!"
effects: Upon use, this item will fart, pushing enemies away and causing a wave of rocks to spawn that spread outwards from Isaac in a circle, dealing 10 damage per hit to any enemies caught in it
Can be used to open secret rooms
Visually this item is very similar to Butter Bean
The rock waves can destroy destructible objects, e.g. poop

items.title: Crooked Penny
effects: When used, you have a 50% chance to double all items, consumables and chests in the current room
If the effect fails, all pickups and items are deleted and Crooked Penny spawns 1 coin
If there are no consumables currently on the floor, Crooked Penny spawns 1 coin
This item works with items which can be purchased such as shop items, allowing you to spawn a free version if the effect triggers
If used in a shop and the effect fails, a Restock box can be used to restore the shop items. This mechanic is very useful on Greed and Greedier modes
items.unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Delirium in The Void floor with Keeper.

items.title: Dull Razor
effects: Upon use this item hurts Isaac without actually taking health away, allowing you to activate any items which trigger when taking damage without losing health
items.unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Delirium on The Void floor with Eve.

items.title: Potato Peeler
effects: When used, this item permanently removes one of your red heart containers and gives you a flat +0.2 Damage Up, +0.5 Range Up and a Cube of Meat
The range increase will only last for the current room, but the Cube of Meat and Damage Up are both permanent
Only works for red hearts and has no effect when used if you only have soul/black hearts
Has no recharge time and can be used as often as you like
It is possible to generate multiple meatboys by stacking more than 4 Cubes of Meat

items.title: Metronome
effects: When used, this item gives you the effect of a random item for the rest of the room
Using this item multiple times in the same room will replace the previous item's effect with a new one
Certain items can be activated with this item which have unexpected effects and many items will do nothing
Items do not grant consumable drops which would normally occur when that item is picked up
Most flight-granting items have cosmetic effects only, and will not allow you to fly
Items that usually give HP up will not give extra health when gained from Metronome
items.unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Greedier Mode with Eden.

items.title: D infinity
effects: When picked up, this item gives you a random Dice active item, which will transform into another random dice upon use
Possible dice include: D4, D6, D8, D10, D12, D20, D100
All dice given by this item have a 2 room recharge time
items.unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Delirium in The Void floor with Isaac.

items.title: Eden's Soul
effects: A one time use active item that when used, will spawn 2 random item pedestals from the item pool associated with the current room (e.g. in an Angel room, this will spawn 2 Angel room items)
Starts with charge that is on your current spacebar item and requires 12 charges to use
items.unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Delirium in The Void floor with Eden.

items.title: Acid Baby
effects: Every 2 rooms Acid Baby will drop a random pill
Every time you use a pill, Acid Baby will poison all enemies in the room, dealing double your tear damage to each of them

items.title: YO LISTEN!
effects: A familiar fairy that will float around the room and highlight the location of any secret room doors, tinted rocks or trapdoors under rocks
Upon entering a new room, if there is an undiscovered secret room or tinted rock, it will move directly to the point of interest, otherwise it will just randomly fly around the room
+1 Luck Up

items.title: Adrenaline
effects: For every empty red heart container, Isaac gains +0.2 Damage Up and his body increases in size
Only works on full hearts - damage does not change if Isaac is missing 1/2 of a heart in one container.
Healing empty red heart containers will remove the damage increases
Has no effect for The Lost and ???, as they cannot gain red heart containers (except for counting towards the Spun transformation)

items.title: Jacob's Ladder
effects: Isaac gains electric tears, which fire 1-2 sparks of electricty in random directions upon hitting any object or enemy
The electricty deals half of your normal tear damage
Tear effects will still apply to your electricty sparks in a lot of cases (e.g. Spoon Bender will give them a homing effect)
Tears which fall naturally to the floor at max range do not generate sparks

items.title: Ghost Pepper
effects: Each tear now has a small chance to be a fire instead, which deals 23 damage to enemies that come in contact with it.
The fire will remain in place and shrink in size when deals damage to something. After dealing enough damage it will eventually disappear

items.title: Euthanasia
effects: Each tear now has a small chance to be a needle instead, which deals 3 times your tear damage.
If a needle hits a non-boss enemy it will instantly kill it and will explode into a circle of 10 more needles
The 10 spawned needles will also deal 3 times your tear damage, but won't instantly kill enemies or explode into more needles
The chance to for each tear to become a needle is affected by your luck stat and at +15 Luck it will activate every time
items.itemPool: Item Room, Curse Room, Demon Beggar
items.unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Delirium in The Void floor with Lilith.

items.title: Camo Undies
effects: Upon entering a new room, Isaac will become camouflaged and enemies won't attack until you start firing tears
Bosses are immune to this effect

items.title: Duality
effects: Any time a devil or angel room door opens after a boss, the other one will also spawn
The extra door will only spawn if a devil or angel room was randomly chosen to spawn already
After entering one of the doors, the other will disappear
If there isn't an available wall for the extra door to spawn on, only one door will spawn (i.e. in a small boss room)
items.unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Greedier Mode with Lilith.

items.title: Eucharist
effects: Gives you a 100% chance to find an Angel Room on every valid floor after defeating the boss
Doesn't spawn an angel room on any floor where it is normally not possible to find one (e.g. Basement 1, Cathedral, Sheol etc.)
Keeps the chance at 100% even after entering and leaving the angel room, meaning the door will not close after visiting
Makes it impossible to find Devil Rooms again, unless you find a way to remove or reroll this item away, or find the Duality item
items.unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Delirium in The Void floor with Maggy.

items.title: Sack of Sacks
effects: A sack familiar that has a random chance to drop a sack at the end of each room
items.unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Greedier Mode as Cain.

items.title: Greed's Gullet
effects: Gives you an extra heart container for every 25 coins you are currently holding, up to a maximum of 4 extra HP at 99 coins held
If your coin counter goes below the required amount for a heart container, you will lose it again
This item works for the Keeper, allowing him to exceed his usual 2 health containers.
However, if Keeper drops to under 2 health coins as a result of Greed's Gullet, he is unable to use a HP Up to increase his health back to 2, and has to regain the lost coins to do so.
items.unlock: Unlock this item by beating Challenge #35 (Pong).

items.title: Large Zit
effects: Gives you a random chance while firing tears to also fire a creep shot, which deals double your tear damage and places white creep on the floor infront of you that slows enemies down if they walk through it
Unlike some similar tear effects, your luck stat does not alter the chance for this effect to activate

items.title: Little Horn
effects: While firing tears you have a chance to fire a piercing void tear, that will instantly kill any non-boss enemy it comes into contact with
Isaac also grows a horn on his head, which causes you to deal contact damage to enemies by running into them (this effect deals base damage of 3.5)

items.title: Brown Nugget
effects: When used, will spawn a fly turret that doesn't move and fires tears at nearby enemies
Only persists for the current room
The fly's bullets deal 2 damage each and do not scale with your own damage stat
items.unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Ultra Greed as Apollyon.

items.title: Poke Go
effects: At the start of each new hostile room, you have a chance to gain a random charmed familiar which will fight for you
The charmed enemy has its own health bar and will die if it takes enough damage
Charmed enemies persist between each room and floor for as long as they stay alive
Allows you to have more than one charmed familiar at a time if you can keep them alive

items.title: BackStabber
effects: Every time one of your tears hits an enemy, it has a chance to start bleeding, which will cause it to take damage equal to 10% of its maximum health every 5 seconds.
Damaging enemies from behind gives the bleed effect a 100% chance to apply
The tear that inflicts the bleed effect also deals double damage
The bleed effect cannot be applied to immune enemies (e.g. bosses and mini bosses)

items.title: Sharp Straw
effects: When used, Sharp Straw will deal damage to all enemies in the room
The damage dealt is equal to Isaac's current tear damage plus 10% of the enemy's max health
Every time this item deals damage to an enemy, it has a chance to drop 1/2 red hearts or 1/2 soul hearts.

items.title: Mom's Razor
effects: A razor blade orbital that deals contact damage and applies the bleeding status effect to enemies, which will cause them to take damage equal to 10% of their total health every 5 seconds
The contact damage dealt by Mom's Razor is equal to 20% of your current tear damage (scales with damage upgrades)
Does not block enemy shots
The bleed effect does not affect bosses
Its speed is not affected by the Guardian Angel item

items.title: Bloodshot Eye
effects: An eye orbital that shoots a tear every 2 seconds that deals 3.5 damage and deals 2 contact damage per tick to enemies
Tears will fire in the direction it is currently facing and do not target enemies
Unlike other orbitals, this item does not block enemy projectiles
The damage dealt by this orbital does not scale with damage upgrades
Its speed is not affected by the Guardian Angel item

items.title: Delirious
effects: When used, spawns a charmed random white delirium version of a boss, that will fight for you and kill other enemies for the rest of the current room
Possible bosses spawned include most bosses in the game
Some bosses' effects can harm Isaac. For example if the spawned boss leaves creep, it can damage Isaac
items.unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Delirium for the first time on any character

items.title: Angry Fly
effects: A familiar fly that orbits around a random enemy in the room until that enemy dies, dealing 2 contact damage to other enemies
Angry Fly will move to the next enemy after the one it is currently orbiting dies, until the room is cleared, at which point it will return to orbiting Isaac
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #1 and based on the Steam Workshop mod created by Custom Phase

items.title: Black Hole
effects: A throwable active item that places a black hole on the ground where it lands, sucking all enemies into it for 6 seconds
Enemies stuck inside the black hole take rapid damage over time
The Black Hole will also suck Isaac into it, but with a much weaker effect than to enemies
The Black Hole will destroy nearby obstacles such as rocks and pots
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #1 and based on the Steam Workshop mod created by Custom Phase

items.title: Bozo
effects: +0.1 Damage Up
+1 Soul Heart
Adds a random chance for an enemy in the current room to become charmed or feared briefly
Adds a random chance to spawn a rainbow poop upon taking damage
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #1 and based on the Steam Workshop mod created by Electoon

items.title: Broken Modem
effects: Causes random enemies to 'lag' at random intervals, causing them to freeze in place for a second
The lag effect can also apply to tears, projectiles and consumables on the ground
Isaac's Luck stat affects how often the lag effect occurs
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #1 and based on the Steam Workshop mod created by Freezenification

items.title: Mystery Gift
effects: A one-time use item that spawns a random item from the current room's item pool, with a chance for it to spawn Lump of Coal or The Poop instead
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #1 and based on the Steam Workshop mod created by Mills

items.title: Sprinkler
effects: When used, spawns a Sprinkler that rotates in a circle, spraying tears in all directions.
Will also synergize with some other items, such as Mom's Eye, Brimstone, Dr. Fetus, Tech X or Loki's Horns
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #1 and based on the Steam Workshop mod created by Kieran and Stewartisme

items.title: Fast Bombs
effects: +7 Bombs
Allows you to rapidly place bombs on the ground
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #1

items.title: Buddy in a Box
effects: When picked up, gives Isaac a random familiar which has a random sprite and tear effect
The familiar will be fully randomized again upon entering the next floor
The appearance is chosen from a random co-op baby sprite
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #1 and based on the Steam Workshop mod created by Ashkait and Scayze

items.title: Lil Delirium
effects: A familiar that will transform into another random familiar every 10 seconds, copying their behaviour and effect
Can be any other familiar, including (but not limited to) Lil' Brimstone, Bob's Brain, BBF, Meatboy, Rotten Baby
Familiars appear as a white Delirium version of the original
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #1 and based on the Steam Workshop mod created by Ashkait and Scayze

items.title: Jumper Cables
effects: This item gives you 1 bar of charge on your active item for every 15 enemies you kill
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #2 and based on the Steam Workshop mod created by Ashkait and Scayze

items.title: Coupon
effects: When used, the coupon causes one random item in the shop to become free
The effect of this item also works in Devil Rooms, allowing you to take one random item for free
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #2 and based on the Steam Workshop mod created by Plumbo

items.title: Telekinesis
effects: An active that causes all enemy tears to be held in place and then thrown back away from Isaac for a period of 3 seconds
Has a recharge time of about 2 seconds
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #2

items.title: Moving Box
effects: When used, the box will pick up a maximum of 6 items. Using the box again will put the picked up items back on the floor again, allowing you to move things between rooms
Can move any of the following: Batteries, Items, Trinkets, Hearts, Keys, Bombs, Coins, Chests and more
Using Moving Box with Car Battery will trigger 2 interactions at the same time: First it will drop all items currently inside the box and secondly will then pick up the current room's contents.
When used in a room with 2 items you can choose from (e.g. There's Options, Double item room, Boss Rush) the Moving Box will pick only one of the items at random
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #2 and based on the Steam Workshop mod created by HurleyFarrill

items.title: Technology Zero
effects: Your tears will now be connected together by beams of electricity which deals damage to enemies they hit
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #2 and based on the Steam Workshop mod created by Ashkait and Scayze

items.title: Leprosy
effects: Taking damage will spawn an orbital that rotates around Isaac, dealing contact damage to enemies and blocking enemy projectiles
A maximum of 3 Leprocy orbitals can be active at one time
Using the orbital to deal damage to enemies can cause it to break
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #2. Based loosely on the Steam Workshop mod created by Extreme Ninja Home Makeover with changes by Edmund McMillen

items.title: 7 Seals
effects: Gives you a random Harbinger familiar that changes every 10 seconds.
Each harbinger behaves differently, based on any of the original 5 horsemen bosses
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #3. Based on the Steam Workshop mod created by by Scayze and Ashkait

items.title: Mr. ME!
effects: Upon use, this item summons a ghost near Isaac that will follow him around. Also summons a blue crosshair which can be moved around freely. After a few seconds, the crosshair will disappear, and the Ghost will do certain things based on what you targeted:
Items, pickups, trinkets: Brings them to Isaac. Works in shops and devil deals as well, allowing you to take them for no cost
Buttons: Presses the button
Enemies: Attacks the enemy until either the ghost or the enemy dies
Doors: Opens the door, even if it is locked
Secret room entrances: Explodes and opens the entrance
Slot machines, dead shopkeepers: Charges towards them and explodes them
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #3. Based on the Steam Workshop mod created by Jean-Alphonse

items.title: Angelic Prism
effects: Grants a prism orbital with a large orbital radius
Isaac's tears that pass through the prism split into four multi-colored tears
Does not deal contact damage to enemies that it passes over
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #3. Based on the Steam Workshop mod created by electoon and Erfly

items.title: Pop!
effects: Replaces Isaac's tears with eyeballs that can bounce off of each other
Issac's tears are no longer limited by range, and will instead dissipate when they stop moving or when hitting an enemy or obstacle
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #3. Based on the Steam Workshop mod created by Scayze and Ashkait

items.title: Death's List
effects: Upon entering a room, a skull appears over a random enemy's head.
Killing the marked enemy will cause the skull to move to a different enemy.

If all enemies in the room are cleared in the order they are marked, Isaac gains a random reward from one of the following: Soul heart, Key, Pill, Bomb, Nickel, +0.2 Speed, +0.5 Range, +0.5 Tears, +1 Flat damage or +1 luck
Killing enemies in the wrong order will ruin end streak and deny you any extra rewards.
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #4. Based on the Steam Workshop mod created by Merlo.

items.title: Haemolacria
effects: With Haemolacria, Isaac's tears become bloody and now fire by in the air in an arc.
Upon hitting the floor, an obstacle or enemy, the bloody tear will burst and fire lots of smaller tears at random directions around the impact point
Tears Down
Your damage stat is unaffected by this item, however the large bloody tear does roughly +30% of your tear damage and the smaller scattering tears deal 50-75% of your tear damage.
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #4. Based on the Steam Workshop mod (originally called Water Balloon) created by HiHowAreYou.

items.title: Lachryphagy
effects: Isaac's tears slow down over time while moving across the room, and upon stopping completely or hitting an object will burst into 8 smaller tears which fire in all directions.
This item will also allow you to 'feed' a tear with other tears. Doing so will cause it to increase in size, and also increase their damage and the damage of the burst tears.
Once a tear is fed 5 times, it will immediately burst
Tears in the burst will deal half the damage the main tear would have.
Tears which hit an enemy do not burst
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #4. Based on the Steam Workshop mod (originally called Hungry Tears) created by Echo

items.title: Trisagion
effects: Isaac's tears are replaced with piercing holy flashes of light, which travel across the room in a similar speed to regular tears.
Trisagion tears deal roughly 33% of your usual tear damage, however due to the size of the holy flash it is likely to hit enemies multiple times
Trisagion tears cause no knockback on enemies and simply travel through them (piercing tears)
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #4. Based on the Steam Workshop mod (originally called Lightshot) created by Wyvern and TRPG

items.title: Schoolbag
effects: Gives you an extra active item slot
Pressing the CTRL key allows you to switch active items
Functions exactly the same as the Antibirth item with the same name
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #4.

items.title: Swallowed Penny
effects: Each time you get hit, you drop a coin or two.
items.unlock: Unlock this item by beating Challenge #15 (Slow Roll).

items.title: Petrified Poop
effects: While held, Isaac has a significantly higher chance to find drops when breaking poops.

items.title: AAA Battery
effects: Lowers your spacebar item charge rate by 1.
Cannot lower the charge of your spacebar item below 1 room.
For example, you will now be able to use a 3 room charge item after 2 rooms instead.

items.title: Broken Remote
effects: Does the teleport effect every time you use your current spacebar item.
Can be used infinitely every room if you have Guppy's Paw and no red heart containers (Can be exploited to get to the boss room without clearing any other rooms).

items.title: Purple Heart
effects: Higher chance for champion enemies while held.

items.title: Broken Magnet
effects: Has a partial Magneto effect and will attract coins, pulling them into Isaac from a distance.
Does not attract other pickups like the full Magneto item does.

items.title: Rosary Bead
effects: Increases your chances to find an Angel Room instead of a Devil Room.
Normally there is a 50%/50% chance of a Angel or Devil room with if a door spawns after the boss. The Rosary Bead changes this to a 75%/25% chance of an angel or devil room (respectively).

items.title: Cartridge
effects: When Isaac takes damage, there is a chance he will gain the Gamekid effect, turning him invincible and dealing contact damage to any enemies he touches.
The chance to activate the invincibility effect is affected by your luck stat and at +38 Luck it will activate every time you get hit.

items.title: Pulse Worm
effects: Tears shrink and grow in size as they go across the room.
Does not appear to affect your damage and only the hitbox size of tears.

items.title: Wiggle Worm
effects: Tears now move in a wave fashion across the room.

items.title: Ring Worm
effects: While held, tears move in a spiral pattern across the screen at high speed.
Effectively increases your range due to the tear pattern.

items.title: Flat Worm
effects: Tears become flat and disc shaped giving them a larger hitbox.
Higher knockback effect with your tears.

items.title: Store Credit
effects: While this trinket is held, all items in the Shop cost 0 coins.
After buying any 0 cent item in the Shop, the trinket disappears.
items.unlock: Unlock this item by beating the Chest with Lazarus.

items.title: Callus
effects: Isaac no longer takes damage from walking over spikes and blood creep while this trinket is held.

items.title: Lucky Rock
effects: Rocks now drop money when broken.
items.unlock: Unlock this item by destroying 100 rocks.

items.title: Mom's Toenail
effects: Mom's Leg will now appear every 60 seconds and stomp down randomly in the room dealing 300 damage to enemies, similar to how Daddy Longlegs works but less frequent.
Be warned though, Mom's leg can also stomp and hurt Isaac too!

items.title: Black Lipstick
effects: Increases the chance for Black hearts to spawn.
items.unlock: Unlock this item by beating the Dark Room with Eve.

items.title: Bible Tract
effects: Gives you a higher chance of eternal hearts.
Contrary to popular belief, the Bible Tract doesn't allow Angel Rooms to appear after paying for a Devil Deal.

items.title: Paper Clip
effects: Allows you to unlock golden chests without needing a key.
Does not work on locked rooms.

items.title: Monkey's Paw
effects: When you reach half a heart of life remaining, a black heart will spawn.
After three black hearts have spawned, the trinket dissapears.

items.title: Mysterious Paper
effects: Imitates the behaviours of some of the other 'paper' items/trinkets.
A Missing Page: When taking damage, Isaac has a chance to deal damage to the entire room in a Necronomicon style effect.
Has a chance to trigger the Polaroid or Negative effect every time you take damage with half a red heart or less.

Missing Poster: Dying in a sacrifice room while holding this trinket will reveal a puzzle piece on the death screen. Finding all the puzzle pieces will help you to reveal the final secret, unlocking the hidden character 'The Lost'.
If held when you touch the chest after the Satan or Isaac fight and you don't have the relevant item to go to the next floor (Polaroid or Negative), you have a small chance to be taken there anyway.
items.unlock: Unlock this item by beating the Chest with Eden.

items.title: Daemon's Tail
effects: When Daemon's Tail is held, most future Heart drop will be rerolled into something else, with a certain chance to be rerolled into a Black Heart.
Every type of heart will be affected (except for hearts spawned in Super Secret Rooms) and causes Mitre, Bible Tract, Mom's Pearl to become useless.
Upon entering a new room that already has hearts on the ground, they will all be converted into Black Hearts.

Hearts that spawn after clearing a room, opening a chest or playing a slot machine/beggar will be re-rolled into another possible pickup that could appear. This essentially means you are sacrificing your heart drops for a higher chance of all other pickups
items.unlock: Unlock this item by beating Satan with Azazel.

items.title: Missing Poster
effects: Dying in a sacrifice room while holding this trinket will reveal a puzzle piece on the death screen. Finding all the puzzle pieces will help you to reveal the final secret, unlocking the hidden character 'The Lost'.
items.unlock: Unlock this item by beating Dark Room with Isaac.

items.title: Butt Penny
effects: Everytime you pick up a coin, you fart.

items.title: Mysterious Candy
effects: Causes Isaac to create poops randomly.

items.title: Hook Worm
effects: Tears now move forwards at right angles, shifting left and right across the room.
Increases your range stat by +10.0 while held but due to the fire pattern, your tears travel a similar distance to normal.

items.title: Whip Worm
effects: +0.5 Shot Speed Up.
Your tears now whip across the room at a very high shot speed.
Shot speed gives your tears more effective range, but doesn't increase your range stat directly.

items.title: Broken Ankh
effects: Has a chance (roughly 20%) to respawn with 3 Soul hearts as Blue Baby when you die.
items.unlock: Unlock this item by beating Satan with Lazarus.

items.title: Fish Head
effects: Everytime Isaac takes damage, one blue fly will spawn.

items.title: Pinky Eye
effects: Isaac's tears have a chance to poison enemies.
The poison effect leaves a damage over time, which deals 4 or 6 damage per tick.
The chance to poison enemies is affected by your luck stat and at +18 Luck it will activate every time.

items.title: Push Pin
effects: Isaac now has a chance to make a spectral and piercing tear.
The chance to fire a piercing tear is affected by your luck stat and at +18 Luck it will activate every time.

items.title: Liberty Cap
effects: While held, this trinket gives a random mushroom effect each room
Possible mushrooms include: Mini Mush, Odd Mushroom (Thin), Odd Mushroom (Thick), The Compass.

items.title: Umbilical Cord
effects: If you take damage which leaves you at 1/2 a heart, you gain a Little Steve familiar that follows you and shoots homing tears.

items.title: Child's Heart
effects: Gives Isaac a higher chance to find hearts from drops after clearing a room and from chests.

items.title: Curved Horn
effects: +2 Damage Up
items.unlock: Unlock this item by beating the Dark Room with Judas.

items.title: Rusted Key
effects: Gives Isaac a higher chance to find keys and chests.

items.title: Goat Hoof
effects: +0.15 Speed Up.

items.title: Mom's Pearl
effects: Grants a secondary chance of any non-specific heart drop turning into a soul heart.

items.title: Cancer
effects: -2 Tear Delay (Tears Up).
The fire rate increase is applied in such a way that the higher your tear stat is, the more effective Cancer is.
Breaks the normal fire rate cap, allowing you to fire faster than the normal maximum.

items.title: Red Patch
effects: You have a chance when taking damage to gain +1.8 Damage Up for the rest of the room.

items.title: Match Stick
effects: Gives Isaac a higher chance to find bombs.
Picking up the Match Stick is the only way to remove the Tick trinket.

items.title: Lucky Toe
effects: +1 Luck Up while held.
items.unlock: Unlock this item by blowing up 20 shop keepers (this includes the ones in the secret room).

items.title: Cursed Skull
effects: When you take damage while on 1/2 a heart, you are teleported back to the previous room.

items.title: Safety Cap
effects: Gives Isaac a higher chance to find pills.

items.title: Ace of Spades
effects: Gives Isaac a higher chance to find Tarot cards after clearing a room or from chests.

items.title: Isaac's Fork
effects: After clearing a room, you have a chance to heal for half a red heart.

items.title: A Missing Page
effects: When taking damage, Isaac has a chance to deal damage to the entire room in a Necronomicon style effect.
The chance to damage enemies is affected by your luck stat and at +50 or more Luck it will activate 50% of the time.

items.title: Bloody Penny
effects: Everytime you pick up a penny, you have a chance to spawn a red heart on the floor.
items.unlock: Unlock this item by beating the Chest with Samson.

items.title: Burnt Penny
effects: Everytime you pick up a coin, you have a chance to spawn a bomb on the floor.
items.unlock: Unlock this item by beating Challenge #13 (Beans!).

items.title: Flat Penny
effects: Everytime you pick up a coin, you have a chance to spawn a key.

items.title: Counterfeit Penny
effects: When picking up a coin, you have a chance to automatically gain one more coin.
items.unlock: Unlock this item by playing the shell game in the arcade 100 times.

items.title: Tick
effects: When you enter a boss room, immediately remove 15% health from the boss and restore 1 red heart.

This trinket can only be removed by using the Smelter item (Afterbirth+ DLC only) or picking up the Match Stick trinket, meaning you are otherwise unable to take any more trinkets unless you get another item which allows you to hold a second trinket (e.g. Mom's Purse).

items.title: Isaac's Head
effects: While held, this trinket gives Isaac a familiar that shoots piercing tears that deal 3.5 damage.
items.unlock: Unlock this item by beating the Boss Rush with Isaac.

items.title: Maggy's Faith
effects: At the start of a new floor, you get an eternal heart.
items.unlock: Unlock this item by beating the Dark Room with Maggy.

items.title: Judas' Tongue
effects: Items which cost 2 heart containers in a deal with the devil are reduced to only cost 1 heart.
items.unlock: Unlock this item by beating Satan with Judas.

items.title: ???'s Soul
effects: Creates a familiar which moves around the room in a similar fashion to The Peeper, shooting tears in the same direction as Isaac.
items.unlock: Unlock this item by beating the Dark Room with Blue Baby.

items.title: Samson's Lock
effects: When you kill an enemy, you have a chance to get +0.5 damage up for the current room.
items.unlock: Unlock this item by beating the Dark Room with Samson.

items.title: Cain's Eye
effects: Gives a 25% chance to reveal map icons at the start of a new floor (The same effect as the Compass).
items.unlock: Unlock this item by beating the Chest with Cain.

items.title: Eve's Bird Foot
effects: When you kill an enemy, you have a chance to spawn a transparent Dead Bird familiar.
The Dead Bird familiar deals 2 damage per tick to enemies while in contact with them.
items.unlock: Unlock this item by beating the Isaac boss with Eve.

items.title: The Left Hand
items.pickup: "The left hand path reaps dark rewards"
effects: Replaces chest spawns with red chests.
items.unlock: Unlock this item by beating Ultra Pride.

items.title: Shiny Rock
effects: While held, tinted rocks and rocks with a crawlspace below them will flash white every 10 seconds.

items.title: Safety Scissors
effects: Turns all troll bombs into bombs which you can pick up and use.
Super Troll bombs turn into 1+1 free double bomb pickups.

items.title: Rainbow Worm
effects: Gives your tears a random worm effect every few seconds.
The possible tear effects include: Whip Worm, Ring Worm, Wiggle Worm, Flat Worm, Hook Worm, Pulse Worm, Tape Worm and Lazy Worm

items.title: Tape Worm
effects: While held, Tape Worm doubles your range stat and halves your tear height stat.

items.title: Lazy Worm
effects: -0.4 Shot Speed Down.
+4.0 Range Up.
+2.0 Tear Height.

items.title: Cracked Dice
effects: Every time you get hit, you have a chance to activate the D6, D20, D8 or D12 effect.
items.unlock: Unlock this item by beating Greed Mode with ???.

items.title: Super Magnet
effects: While held this trinket causes all pickups and enemies to move slowly towards you.
Will also attract the Mom's Foot and Ultra Greed door entities.

items.title: Faded Polaroid
effects: Randomly Isaac will gain a camouflage for a few seconds and all enemies in the current room will have a confused status effect applied to them.

items.title: Louse
effects: Gives a small chance to spawn a friendly attack spider while in a hostile room with enemies.

items.title: Bob's Bladder
effects: Leaves a pool of green creep under all bombs you place, which damages enemies that walk over it.

items.title: Watch Battery
effects: Gives you an increased chance of finding battery consumables.
Has a chance to add an extra charge to your active item upon completing a room.

items.title: Blasting Cap
effects: Exploding bombs now have a chance to drop another bomb that you can pick up.

items.title: Stud Finder
effects: Higher chance to find crawl spaces when exploding rocks.
items.unlock: Unlock this trinket by beating Challenge #27 (Brains).

items.title: Error
effects: Gives a different trinket effect per room, randomly choosing between any of the other available trinkets in the game.
Each room is locked to a specific trinket effect, meaning if you exit and re-enter a room, that specific room will always have the same effect.

items.title: Poker Chip
effects: Chests now have a 50/50 chance to either pay out with extra consumables or nothing/an enemy.
items.unlock: Unlock this trinket by beating Challenge #26 (I Rule).

items.title: Blister
effects: Tears have a stronger knockback effect while this trinket is held

items.title: Second Hand
effects: Increases the time that status effects stay on enemies. e.g. With poison effects, the damage over time poison will last for much longer.

items.title: Endless Nameless
effects: While held there is a small chance when using a tarot card or pill that a copy of it will be dropped on the floor next to you.

items.title: Black Feather
effects: +0.2 Damage Up for each 'evil' item you have.
Items classed as evil in this case are Black Candle, Ceremonial Robes, Abaddon, Goat Head, Match Book, Missing Page 2, Safety Pin.
items.unlock: Unlock this item by beating Greed Mode with Eve.

items.title: Blind Rage
effects: Invincibility lasts longer after getting hit (Increased i-frames)
This makes it possible to use the Blood Donation machine twice from one hit of damage.
items.unlock: Unlock this item by beating Blue Womb (Hush) with Samson.

items.title: Golden Horse Shoe
effects: +15% chance to get a double item room to spawn on the next floor.
If the effect activates, two items spawn in your item room, however only one can be taken (Same effect as the More Options item)
The chance doubles to +30% with the effect from Mom's Box.

items.title: Store Key
effects: Automatically opens all shop room doors for free.
items.unlock: Unlock this trinket by donating 666 coins to the Greed Donation Machine.UNLOCK: Keeper starts with this trinket after beating Satan with Keeper.

items.title: Rib of Greed
effects: Forces the Greed and Super Greed mini bosses to no longer appear in shops or secret rooms.
items.unlock: Unlock this trinket by beating Ultra Greed with Keeper.

items.title: Karma
effects: Donating to a Donation Machine has a chance to heal Isaac for a full red heart or spawn a Beggar.
items.unlock: Unlock this item by beating The Lamb boss with Keeper.

items.title: Lil Larva
effects: Destroying poops now gives you a blue fly

items.title: Mom's Locket
effects: While held, you heal for half a red heart every time you use a key to open a door or golden chest.
Changes all half red hearts into full hearts.

items.title: NO!
effects: While this trinket is held you have a significantly lower chance to find spacebar/active items.
It will cause passive items to spawn except when the game cannot generate any more passive items and will then instead choose spacebar/active items.
Some hard coded spacebar items from bosses and mini-bosses (i.e. Krampus Head) can still spawn.
Bible drops caused by the Rosary item are not prevented by this trinket.

items.title: Child Leash
effects: Causes your familiars to stay closer to each other.

items.title: Brown Cap
effects: Poop in the environment will now explode when destroyed.

items.title: Meconium
effects: While held you have an increased chance for Black Poops to spawn, which deal damage to all enemies in the room when destroyed
Gives The Poop active item a chance to spawn a Black Poop too
items.unlock: Unlock this trinket by defeating Greedier Mode with ???.

items.title: Cracked Crown
effects: Gives you extra stat upgrades based on the items you've already collected that have stat increases, at roughly +30% of the item's original increase
Also gives you a tears up if you don't already have an item that increases your tears stat

items.title: Used Diaper
effects: While held, gives the Skatole effect only in certain rooms, which will turn hostile flies to neutral and stop others from shooting.
Attack, Dart and Ring Flies turn into neutral Black Flies and Pooters and Fat Flies will no longer fire at you.

items.title: Fish Tail
effects: Items and trinkets which generate blue flies and spiders will have double the effect, causing twice as many to spawn

items.title: Black Tooth
effects: Some tears will randomly become a black tooth, that deal double your normal tear damage and can poison enemies

items.title: Ouroboros Worm
effects: Tears become spectral and travel in a large spiral pattern
+4.0 Range Up

items.title: Tonsil
effects: Every time you take damage you have a very small chance to gain a Tonsil familiar, which follows you and blocks enemy projectiles
This effect can happen twice before the Tonsil trinket is destroyed
Does not deal contact damage to enemies

The Tonsil familiar counts as a passive item but does not appear in any item pools, meaning this trinket is the only way to find it (aside from starting with it as Eden) and make it appear in your Items Collection page.

items.title: Nose Goblin
effects: Your tears have a random chance to become booger tears
Booger tears stick on to enemies and deal periodic poison damage until they die or 60 seconds passes. Each tick of poison damage is equal to your normal tear damage
The boogers will have a homing effect

items.title: Super Ball
effects: Some random tears will gain the Rubber Cement effect and become bouncy

items.title: Vibrant Bulb
effects: Grants +0.25 Speed, +0.75 Range, +0.1 Shot Speed, +0.2 Tears, +0.5 Damage and +1 Luck when Isaac's active item is fully charged
Infinite use items such as Potato Peeler count as charged and provide the bonus from this trinket

items.title: Dim Bulb
effects: Grants +0.5 Speed, +1.5 Range, +0.3 Shot Speed, +0.4 Tears, +1.5 Damage when Isaac's active item is completely uncharged
One-time use items such as Mama Mega count as uncharged and provide the bonus from this trinket.

items.title: Fragmented Card
effects: Gives you another secret room on each new floor while held
Does not spawn more than one super secret room, only the normal secret room

items.title: Equality!
effects: When you have the same amount of coins, bombs and keys, half consumables turn into their doubled version
This effect works for any number of consumables, including 0 and 99, as long as the count for coins/keys/bombs is equal

items.title: Wish Bone
effects: Every time you take damage you have a very small chance to spawn a random pedestal item
When the effect triggers, the trinket is destroyed

items.title: Bag Lunch
effects: Every time you take damage you have a very small chance to spawn the Lunch item, which gives +1 HP up
When the effect triggers, this trinket is destroyed

items.title: Lost Cork
effects: Increases the radius of any creep you produce

items.title: Crow Heart
effects: While held, any damage taken will ignore soul hearts and black hearts, causing your red heart containers to be depleted first
While at 1/2 of a red heart, it will begin to remove your soul hearts and black hearts on damage again.
items.unlock: Unlock this item by beating Greedier mode with Eve.

items.title: Walnut
effects: When you take damage, the walnut cracks and drops a random trinket, coin, heart and key
The Walnut trinket is destroyed once the effect activates
Walking over a dead shopkeeper corpse will trigger the effect

items.title: Duct Tape
effects: Causes any orbitals you have to stop moving while held
Stops shooting familiars from moving (including Lilith's Incubus)
Some familiars with irregular movement are not affected by Duct Tape, such as Abel, BBF, Bumbo, Guppy's Hair Ball, Lil Gurdy, Punching Bag, Robo-Baby 2.0, Succubus

items.title: Silver Dollar
effects: While held, shops will now appear on the womb floors (The Womb, Utero and Scarred Womb)
items.unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Delirium in The Void floor with Cain.

items.title: Bloody Crown
effects: While held, item rooms now appear on the womb floors (The Womb, Utero and Scarred Womb)
items.unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Delirium in The Void floor with Samson.

items.title: Pay To Win
effects: While held, restock boxes will always spawn in item rooms

items.title: Locust of War
effects: Upon entering a room with enemies, spawns a Red Locust which detonates upon impact with enemies, dealing double tear damage for the impact of the Locust and 60 damage for the explosion
Can be dangerous as the fly will target the nearest enemy, which can be close enough to catch Isaac in its blast radius
items.unlock: Unlock this trinket by defeating Isaac in the Cathedral as Apollyon.

items.title: Locust of Pestilence
effects: At the start of each new hostile room you spawn a green attack fly, which will target a nearby enemy, deal double your tear damage and then poison them
items.unlock: Unlock this item by beating Satan with Apollyon.

items.title: Locust of Famine
effects: At the start of each new hostile room you spawn a yellow attack fly, which will target a nearby enemy, deal double your tear damage and apply a slowing effect to it
items.unlock: Unlock this trinket by defeating ??? in The Chest as Apollyon.

items.title: Locust of Death
effects: Upon entering a room with enemies, spawns a Black Locust that deals quadruple Isaac's damage, applied as two hits of double damage.
items.unlock: Unlock this trinket by defeating The Lamb as Apollyon.

items.title: Locust of Conquest
effects: At the start of each new hostile room you spawn 2-5 white attack flies, which will target a nearby enemy and deal double your tear damage to it
items.unlock: Unlock this trinket by defeating Boss Rush as Apollyon.

items.title: Bat Wing
effects: When killing an enemy, you have a very small chance to gain the ability to fly for the rest of the room.
items.unlock: Unlock this trinket by defeating Greedier Mode with Azazel.

items.title: Stem Cell
effects: Heals you for 1/2 a red heart after travelling down to the next floor
items.unlock: Unlock this trinket by defeating Greedier Mode with Samson.

items.title: Hairpin
items.pickup: "Poke that power outlet! Bosses charge you"
effects: Fully recharges your active item at the start of each boss fight
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #1 and based on the Steam Workshop mod created by Zaratus

items.title: Wooden Cross
effects: Gives you the Holy Mantle shield effect at the start of every new floor, which protects you from the next hit of damage you take
Does not recharge until the start of the next floor
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #1 and based on the Steam Workshop mod created by Ep and Mills

items.title: Butter!
effects: Using your active item while holding this trinket will drop it back on a pedestal on the ground
Also after taking damage, you have a very small chance to drop one of your passive items
One-time use active items will be consumed and not dropped
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #1 and based on the Steam Workshop mod created by MarkusLeben and iguesti

items.title: Filigree Feather
effects: Holding this trinket will cause the Angel mini bosses to drop normal items instead of Key Pieces
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #2, designed by Edmund McMillen

items.title: Door Stop
effects: While held, the last door Isaac went through stays open, allowing him to leave the room even if enemies are in it
This trinket works on boss rooms (except Ultra Greed) and devil rooms containing Krampus, allowing you to exit out mid-fight

items.title: Extension Cord
effects: After being picked up, a yellow laser chain now flows through Isaac's familiars.
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #4 and based on the Steam Workshop mod created by Strawrat and Aczom

items.title: O - The Fool
effects: Teleports the player to the first room of the current floor.

items.title: I - The Magician
effects: For the current room, tears now have the Spoon Bender effect, which allows them to curve towards enemies and gives them a purрle appearance.

items.title: II - The High Priestess
effects: Summons Mom's foot which will stomp on a random enemy in the current room, dealing 300 damage.
If no enemies are in the current room, the foot will target Isaac (and do damage if it hits), however it can be used to break rocks.

items.title: III - The Empress
effects: Gives the player the Whore of Babylon effect for the current room, increasing damage and speed.

items.title: IV - The Emperor
effects: Teleports the player to the Boss room on the current floor.

items.title: V - The Hierophant
effects: Spawns 2 Soul hearts on the floor.

items.title: VI - The Lovers
items.pickup: "May you prosper and be in good health"
effects: Spawns 2 red hearts on the floor.

items.title: VII - The Chariot
effects: Grants the same effect as 'My Little Unicorn', which makes Isaac invincible and deal 40 contact damage to enemies per hit.

items.title: VIII - Justice
effects: Spawns 1 bomb, 1 key, 1 coin, 1 heart, which can be random variants of each.

items.title: IX - The Hermit
items.pickup: "May you see what life has to offer"
effects: Teleports the player to the Shop.
On or below the Womb, this acts as a random teleport, since there are no shops on those floors.

items.title: X - Wheel of Fortune
effects: Spawns a Slot Machine or a Fortune Machine.

items.title: XI - Strength
effects: Gives the player the Magic Mushroom effect, which increasing size and all stats by 1 for the current room.
If you use the Strength card with 12 heart containers, it will take you down to 11 when you leave the room.

items.title: XII - The Hanged Man
effects: Gives the player the flying effect for the current room, allowing the player to fly over obstacles in the room.
This card is useless if you have any item which allows you to permanently fly.

items.title: XIII - Death
items.pickup: "Lay waste to all that oppose you"
effects: Deals 40 damage to all enemies in the room in a similar style to the Necronomicon.

items.title: XIV - Temperance
effects: Spawns a Blood Donation Machine.

items.title: XV - The Devil
items.pickup: "Revel in the power of your darkness"
effects: Gives the Book of Belial effect for the current room, increasing damage.

items.title: XVI - The Tower
effects: Spawns some troll bombs at random locations in the current room.
Each bomb deals 60 damage (normal bomb damage.

items.title: XVII - The Stars
effects: Teleports the player to the Item Room.
On or below the Womb, this acts as a random teleport, since there are no item rooms on those floors.

items.title: XVIII - The Moon
items.pickup: "May you find all you have lost"
effects: Teleports the player to the Secret Room.

items.title: XIX - The Sun
items.pickup: "May the light heal and enlighten you"
effects: A card with three uses: A full heal, deals 100 damage to all enemies in the current room and reveals the entire map for the current floor (Treasure Map + The Compass).

items.title: XX - Judgement
effects: Spawns a beggar.
Has a chance to be a demon beggar.
Killing a Devil Beggar, Key Master, or Shell Game Beggar gives you an increased chance of finding Angel rooms instead of Devil rooms. See the dedicated Devil room page for more details.

items.title: XXI - The World
effects: Reveals the entire map and shows the icons for every room which has one.
This is completely useless if you currently have both the Treasure Map and The Compass.

items.title: 2 of Spades
effects: Doubles the number of keys you have.
If you have no keys, it gives you two.

items.title: 2 of Clubs
effects: Doubles the number of Bombs you have.
If you have no bombs, it gives you two.

items.title: 2 of Hearts
effects: Doubles your current red hearts up to full health.
This card is useless for the Bluе Baby.

items.title: 2 of Diamonds
effects: Doubles the number of coins you have.
If you have no coins, it gives you two.

items.title: The Joker
effects: Teleports you to the Devil Deal Room on the current floor.

items.title: Chaos Card
effects: A card which can be thrown as a projectile directly infront of Isaac, instantly killing anything it hits, including most bosses.
If thrown at a multi-phase boss with multiple forms such Satan, Mega Satan or Hush it will only kill that particular phase of the boss.
If thrown at a multi-phase boss that works from a single health bar such as Isaac, ??? or The Lamb, it will die instantly.
Will destroy rocks and poop in its path.
Can also be thrown against a door to open it (Doesn't work against Mega Satan's door).
items.unlock: Unlock this card by beating Challenge #9 (Demo Man).

items.title: Credit Card
effects: When used, removes the price tag from all items in the current shop or devil deal, making everything free.
The effect of the Credit Card only lasts for the current room.
items.unlock: Unlock this card by beating Challenge #10 (Cursed!).

items.title: Rules Card
effects: Displays a random cryptic message on the screen similar to the fortune machine ones. One of the following messages may show:
"Rooms may yield more than you expect"
"Some doors require a blessing. Carry them with you"
"The walls will harden over time. Time is the essence"
"Sleeping gatekeepers will need to be awoken with a loud sound"
"A piece of paper is your guide"
"Deny his gifts to attain your reward"
"A dark market lies under your feet
"Chub dislikes smoke!
items.unlock: Unlock this card by beating Challenge #11 (Glass Cannon).

items.title: Card Against Humanity
effects: When used, fills the entire room with poop!
items.unlock: Unlock this card by beating Challenge #12 (When Life Gives You Lemons).

items.title: Suicide King
effects: When used, instantly kills you and spawns 10 pickup on the floor.
Each of the 10 things spawned can be any type of consumable or sometimes a pedestal item (up to a maximum of 3 pedestal items).
Any pedestal item created by Suicide King will be related to the room where it was used, meaning that using it in the Angel room will spawn Angel room items.
items.unlock: Unlock this card by beating Challenge #7 (Suicide King).

items.title: Rune of Algiz
effects: When used, gives you an invincibility effect which lasts for 30 seconds (much longer than normal invincibility effects).
items.unlock: Unlock this card by beating Challenge #8 (Cat Got Your Tongue).

items.title: Rune of Ansuz
effects: When used, reveals the entire map including all the secret room locations and other icon rooms.
items.unlock: Unlock this card by beating Challenge #5 (The Tank).

items.title: Rune of Berkano
effects: Summons 3 blue friendly spiders and 3 blue flies.
items.unlock: Unlock this card by beating Challenge #20 (Purist).

items.title: Rune of Dagaz
effects: Removes the curse which is in effect on the current floor.
Can also cure the effect of the Amnesia pill.
+1 Soul Heart.
items.unlock: Unlock this card by beating Challenge #4 (Darkness Falls).

items.title: Rune of Ehwaz
effects: Creates a trapdoor on the floor (Same effect as We Need To Go Deeper).
items.unlock: Unlock this card by beating Challenge #3 (Head Trauma).

items.title: Rune of Hagalaz
effects: When used, this rune will destroy all breakable objects in the current room, such as poop, rocks and skulls.
items.unlock: Unlock this card by beating Challenge #1 (Pitch Black).

items.title: Rune of Jera
effects: When used this rune will double all pickups on the floor in the room.
Creates copies of pickups, even if you haven't purchased them yet.
Can be used to double the number of golden item chests in the first room of the final Chest floor.
items.unlock: Unlock this card by beating Challenge #2 (High Brow).

items.title: Rune of Perthro
effects: Rerolls all pedestal items in the current room (One time use of the D6).
items.unlock: Unlock this card by beating Challenge #6 (Solar System).

items.title: Dice Rooms
effects: 1 Dot - Rerolls all of your items. (Does not change your trinkets, pills or cards)
2 Dot - Rerolls all pickups in the room. (D20 effect)
3 Dot - Rerolls all pickups on the entire floor.
4 Dot - Rerolls all pedestal items on the floor. (Does not roll your devil deal items)
5 Dot - Reroll and restart the current floor (Forget Me Now effect).
6 Dot - Reroll all of your items and all the pickups on the entire floor (Combined 1 + 3 + 4 rooms).

items.title: Blank Rune
effects: When used, gives a random Mystic rune effect.
Possible effects include: Algiz, Ansuz, Berkano, Dagaz, Ehwaz, Hagalaz, Jera, Perthro.
Also has a 25% chance to spawn another Blank Rune upon use.
items.unlock: Unlock this card by beating Challenge #30 (Guardian).

items.title: Dice Shard
effects: Gives a one-time use of the D6 and D20 effects at the same time.

items.title: Get Out Of Jail Free Card
effects: When used, will open all doors in the current room, similar to a one-time use of Dad's Key.
items.unlock: Unlock this card by beating Challenge #22 (Speed).

items.title: ? Card
effects: When used this card will activate a use of your spacebar item for free.

items.title: Emergency Contact
effects: When used will cause two of Mom's Hand to come down and grab a random enemy.

items.title: Gold Key
effects: Once picked up, you gain unlimited key use for the rest of the floor.

items.title: Gold Heart
effects: Once picked up, the gold heart will drop money on the floor the next time Isaac loses a heart.
items.unlock: Unlock this item by beating challenge #21 (XXXXXXXXL).

items.title: Gold Bomb
effects: Once picked up, you gain unlimited bomb use for the rest of the floor.
items.unlock: Unlock this item by beating challenge #23 (Blue Bomber).

items.title: Ace of Hearts
effects: When used, turns all pickups and chests in the room into Hearts.
items.unlock: Unlock this item by defeating any floor after Basement I with only half a heart of health (works as The Lost).

items.title: Ace of Spades
effects: When used, turns all pickups and chests in the room into Keys.
items.unlock: Unlock this item by defeating The Lamb without taking hearts, coins and bombs.

items.title: Ace of Clubs
effects: When used, turns all pickups and chests in the room into Bombs.
items.unlock: Unlock this item by getting a 3 win streak.

items.title: Ace of Diamonds
effects: When used, turns all pickups and chests in the room into Coins.
items.unlock: Unlock this item by defeating The Lamb in under 20 minutes.

items.title: Holy Card
effects: Grants the Holy Mantle effect for one room, which will negate your next hit of damage
items.unlock: Unlock this item by defeating Delirium in The Void floor with The Lost.

items.title: Black Rune
effects: When used, this rune deals 40 damage to all enemies in the room and consumes all pedestal items in the room, giving you a random stat increase for each item consumed.
Also consumes all pickups in the room and turns them into blue flies and spiders.
items.unlock: Unlock this item by beating Greedier mode as Apollyon.

items.title: Huge Growth
effects: Temporarily makes Isaac huge, giving him +7 Damage Up and +30 Range Up for the rest of the current room
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #1 and based on the Steam Workshop mod created by Coper140

items.title: Ancient Recall
effects: Spawns 3 random cards on the floor when used
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #1 and based on the Steam Workshop mod created by Coper140

items.title: Era Walk
effects: When used, this card will slow down enemies and Isaac's tears, but speed up Isaac's movement speed for the rest of the current room
Added as part of the Afterbirth+ Booster Pack #1 and based on the Steam Workshop mod created by Coper140

items.title: 48 Hour Energy (pill)
effects: Fully recharges your active item and drops 1-2 battery pickups. Can be used with Placebo to generate infinite batteries

items.title: Amnesia (pill)
effects: Hides the floor map for the rest of the current floor (same as curse of the lost). Can be negated with Black Candle

items.title: Bad Gas (pill)
effects: Isaac farts, poisoning enemies around him

items.title: Bad Trip (pill)
effects: Deals damage to yourself

items.title: Balls of Steel (pill)
effects: +2 Soul Hearts

items.title: Bombs are key (pill)
effects: Switches number of bombs and keys

items.title: Explosive Diarrhea (pill)
effects: Spawns five live troll bombs behind Isaac, one per second

items.title: Full Health (pill)
effects: Restores all your empty red heart containers

items.title: Health Down (pill)
effects: -1 HP. If you have 1 or less heart containers, this pill becomes Health Up

items.title: Health Up (pill)
effects: +1 HP
